name: Young Red Dragon
description: A dragon.  It's red and not as big as other dragons

actions.name: multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws

actions.name: bite
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +10 to hit, reach 10ft., one target.  Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: claw
actions.description: Melee weapon attack: +10 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.  Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: the dragon exhales fire in a 30-fot cone.  Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
